page.title: 19Trimpley Reservoir- Leisure
page.content: {Trimpley Sailing Club}rents its water and buildings from Severn Trent Water Authority.A family club,its fees range from Â£30 for a boat-owning family to Â£5 for non-sailing members.Lessons are given April-May. 3 classes of boat are used: Laser, GP14 & Graduate.The club races 52 weeks a year and in 1985 joined the Midland Bell circuit, five crews also entering the World Championships in Swansea. Each July a "Fun Day & Regatta" is held. {Fishing Club}-has Coarse and Game sections.In the Game section, weekend fishers pay Â£55 pa and can keep 6 fish a day; weekday fishers pay Â£75 pa and keep 4 fish a day. The pool is regularly stocked with Carp, Bream and Trout. {Walking and Picnicking}- popular among local people, and the river and Severn Valley Railway add further interest.
